Name: Chaos Jazz
Stats4: Fire DMG and Electric DMG are increased by 15%. When off-field, the damage caused by EX Special Attacks and Assist Attacks is increased by 20%. When the character switches back onto the field, this buff continues for 5s. The lasting effect can be triggered once every 7.5s.

Name: Chaotic Metal
Stats4: The equipper's CRIT DMG increases by 20%. When any character in the squad triggers Corruption's additional DMG, this effect further increases by 5.5% for 8s, stacking up to 6 times. Repeated triggers reset the duration.

Name: Fanged Metal
Stats4: Whenever a squad member inflicts Assault on an enemy, the equipper deals 35% increased damage to the target for 12s.

Name: Freedom Blues
Stats4: When an EX Special Attack hits an enemy, reduce the targets Anomaly Buildup RES to equippers attribute by 20% for 8s. This effect does not stack with others of the same attribute.

Name: Hormone Punk
Stats4: Upon entering combat or switching in, its user's ATK increased by 25% for 10s. This effect can be triggered once every 20s.

Name: Inferno Metal
Stats4: Upon hitting a Burning enemy, the equipper's CRIT Rate is increased by 28% for 8s.

Name: Polar Metal
Stats4: Increases the DMG of Basic Attack and Dash Attack by 20%. When any squad member inflicts Freeze or Shatter, this effect increases by an additional 20% for 12s.

Name: Proto Punk
Stats4: When any squad member triggers a Defensive Assist or Evasive Assist, all squad members deal 15% increased DMG, lasting 10s. Passive effects of the same name do not stack.

Name: Puffer Electro
Stats4: Ultimate DMG increases by 20%. Launching an Ultimate increases the equippers ATK by 15% for 12s.

Name: Shockstar Disco
Stats4: Basic Attacks, Dash Attacks, and Dodge Counters, inflict 20% more Daze upon the main target.

Name: Soul Rock
Stats4: Upon receiving an enemy attack and losing HP, the equipper takes 40% less DMG for 2.5s. This effect can trigger once every 15s.

Name: Swing Jazz
Stats4: Launching a Chain Attack or Ultimate increases all squad members' DMG by 15% for 12s. Passive effects of the same name do not stack.

Name: Thunder Metal
Stats4: As long as an enemy in combat is Shocked, the equipper's ATK is increased by 28%.

Name: Woodpecker Electro
Stats4: Triggering a critical hit with a Basic Attack, Dodge Counter or EX Special Attack increases the equippers ATK by 9% for 6s. The buff duration for different skills are calculated separately.
